2fa.description: You have configured two factor authentication, please enter the 6 digit code

welcome.title: Internxt Desktop
welcome.description:
Welcome to Internxt!

Back up your files with Drive, secure against malware with Antivirus, and optimize performance with Cleaner — all while keeping your privacy protected.

drive.title: Drive
drive.description:
Access all your files from the Internxt Drive folder in your {{platform_app}} sidebar.

Choose to save space with online-only files, or keep essentials available offline — everything stays secure and in sync across your devices.

antivirus.title: Antivirus
antivirus.description:
Protect your device from malware and online threats.

Internxt Antivirus keeps you safe with real-time scans and privacy-first security.

backups.title: Backup
backups.description: With Internxt's upgraded backup feature, you can now safely backup folders on the cloud in order to free up space locally. You can also adjust the backup frequency as you need.

cleaner.title: Cleaner
cleaner.description:
Free up space locally and optimize your device’s performance.

Our cleaner finds and removes unnecessary files, so your device runs smoothly.

onboarding-completed.title: You're all set, enjoy your privacy!

backups-completed.title: {{folders}} folders added to backups
backups-completed.description: Add more folders and schedule automatic backups in Settings

desktop-ready.title: Internxt is ready
desktop-ready.description: Access your stored files from your {{platform_phrase}}’s sidebar

logout-confirmation.title: Log out from this device?
logout-confirmation.message: Internxt Drive will not show up without an account logged in.

no-activity.title: There is no recent activity
no-activity.description: Information will show up here when changes are made to sync your local folder with Internxt Drive

upToDate.title: Your files are up to date
upToDate.subtitle: Sync activity will show up here

sync-error.title: Can't get remote content
sync-error.message: We are having issues retrieving your content from the cloud, please try again

virtual-drive-error.title: Can't mount your drive
virtual-drive-error.message: We are having issues mounting your Internxt Drive, please try again

discover-backups.title: INTERNXT BACKUPS
discover-backups.body: Keep a lifesaver copy of your most important folders and files.

full.title: Your storage is full
full.subtitle: You can't upload, sync, or backup files. Upgrade now your plan or remove files to save up space.

backups.title: Backup folders
backups.add-folders:
Click + to select the folders
 you want to back up
backups.activate: Back up your folders and files

frequency.title: Upload frequency
frequency.warning: Folders won't automatically backup until you click 'Backup now'. This mode is not recommended.

folders.error: We could not load your backups

delete.title: Delete backup
delete.explanation: This backup will be removed from the cloud, all folders and files will remain in this computer

deletion-modal.title: Delete backup?
deletion-modal.explanation: This backup will be removed from the cloud permanently, all folders and files will remain in this computer.

modal.title: Stop ongoing backup
modal.explanation: There are still files that have not yet been uploaded. Stop backup anyway?

featureLocked.title: Feature locked
featureLocked.subtitle: Please upgrade your plan to use this feature.

errorState.title: Something went wrong while scanning the directory

actionRequired.title: Action required
actionRequired.description: Removing the malware will also permanently delete the folder from your storage to protect your device. This action cannot be undone.

securityWarning.title: Security warning
securityWarning.description: Malware is still present, and your device is at risk.
securityWarning.confirmToCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel?

scanProcess.errorWhileScanning: An error occurred while scanning the items. Please try again.

generateReportView.title: No report found
generateReportView.description: Generate a report to see which files can be cleaned up.

cleanupConfirmDialogView.title: Confirm cleanup
cleanupConfirmDialogView.description: This action will permanently delete the selected files from your device. This cannot be undone. Please, confirm to continue.

report-modal.report: You can also send a report about this error.
report-modal.include-logs: Include the logs of this sync process for debug purposes
